name: Moon Way
description:
This is a demo version of a game made for Spooktober Jam 2020. In this game, a young sorceress must collect magic crystals hidden in the maze of an old house. You should also be careful not to fall into clever traps.

Objective: collect all the crystals and exit the room through the far door.

Controls:  - AWSD or Cursor Keys for moving - Spacebar for jump
